qas.question: Who was the most discussed singer in American Idols sixth season?

context: Teenager <a0_0><a4_0><a5_0>Sanjaya Malakar<a5_0/><a4_0/><a0_0/> was the season's most talked-about contestant for his unusual <a6_0>hair<a6_0/>do, and for managing to survive elimination for many weeks due in part to the weblog <a2_0><a7_0>Vote for the Worst<a7_0/><a2_0/> and satellite radio personality <a1_0><a8_0>Howard Stern<a8_0/><a1_0/>, who both encouraged fans to vote for him.
